docs.lead_paragraph: THE NEW YORK TIMES today opens its fifty-fourth annual appeal for New York City's Neediest Cases. Here and on the following pages are their stories -- 100 tragic examples of the ills and misfortunes that afflict our friends and neighbors. They are true stories -- stories of overwhelming despair and of unexpected courage, of the grief that immobilizes and the faith that restores the spirit.

headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; FIFTY-FOURTH ANNUAL APPEAL

docs.abstract: drive opens; Comrs Louchheim and Wyman urge aid
